item.description:
Hi, Everybody!

Fall foliage should be just about peaking now, so pack a huge picnic lunch and get ready for a very relaxing and slow paced hike and fall outing with your fellow Not Too Intense Hikers today

We will meet at 9:15, wait 15 minute for latecomers, and step off at 9:30 sharp. Fall foliage does not happen every day, so for this hike and picnic, come in a relaxed mode, without any day end deadlines to meet, as depending on the wishes of the group, this hike could go longer than planned.

As of now, estimate about 5 - 6 miles for distance and 4 - 5 hours for time (including a full hour relaxing over that huge picnic lunch that you will have earlier packed!) so that we can see the foliage over the river while we are eating.

Directions to follow closer to the time. FYI, the sanctuary does not allow dogs due to birds and wildlife.

Especially given the time of year and that the number of RSVPs may be higher than usual, please be 100% sure of your plans before signing up for this one. There will be another one, this time breakfast instead of picnic, this coming Saturday.

I look forward to seeing some of my regulars and to meeting many for the first time perhaps.

Randy
RandyS@maine.rr.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a silver Subaru at the far end of the lot; we will be wearing Meetup stickers

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Fall Outing at Ipswich River!
